subject: Suits and Litigation
Football
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit filed by N.F.L. players could again end up being decided by Judge David S. Doty, who has often ruled against the league from the federal bench in Minneapolis.
snippet: A lawsuit filed by N.F.L. players could again end up being decided by Judge David S. Doty, who has often ruled against the league from the federal bench in Minneapolis.
